sections.title: Brawler (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Brawler class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Brawler)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with simple weapons, handaxe, short sword, close fighter weapon group, light armor, and shields except tower shields.

sections.title: Brawler’s Cunning (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Treats Intelligence as 13 for combat feat prerequisites if actual Intelligence is lower than 13.

sections.title: Martial Flexibility (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Allows temporary gaining of combat feats as a move action for 1 minute, scaling to multiple feats and faster action types at higher levels.

sections.title: Martial Training (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Counts brawler levels as fighter and monk levels for feat prerequisites and magic item effects, but doesn't grant class features automatically.

sections.title: Unarmed Strike (Brawler)
sections.description: Grants Improved Unarmed Strike, full Strength on damage, choice of lethal/nonlethal damage, and scaling unarmed damage dice.

sections.title: Bonus Combat Feats (Brawler)
sections.description: Grants bonus combat feats at 2nd level and every 3 levels thereafter, with ability to retrain feats starting at 5th level.

sections.title: Brawler’s Flurry (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Grants Two-Weapon Fighting benefits when full attacking with unarmed strikes, close weapons, or monk weapons, with full Strength on all attacks.

sections.title: Maneuver Training (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Provides scaling bonuses to combat maneuver checks and CMD for selected combat maneuvers, with bonuses increasing over time.

sections.title: AC Bonus (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Grants scaling dodge bonuses to AC and CMD when wearing light or no armor, applying against touch attacks.

sections.title: Knockout (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Allows declared attacks to potentially knock targets unconscious on a failed Fortitude save, usable a limited number of times per day.

sections.title: Brawler’s Strike (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Makes unarmed strikes count as magic, cold iron, silver, alignment, and adamantine weapons for overcoming damage reduction at different levels.

sections.title: Close Weapon Mastery (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Allows close weapons to use the brawler's unarmed strike damage (4 levels lower) if it's higher than the weapon's base damage.

sections.title: Awesome Blow (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Grants awesome blow combat maneuver as a standard action, dealing damage and knocking opponents flying 10 feet prone.

sections.title: Improved Awesome Blow (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Allows awesome blow as an attack instead of standard action, works on any size, and can critical hit on natural 20.

sections.title: Perfect Warrior (Ex) (Brawler)
sections.description: Capstone ability that increases maneuver training bonuses by 2 and dodge bonus to AC by 2, replacing martial flexibility improvement.
